actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974.

summary.text: Amends the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to provide that a declaration of a state of emergency is effective as of the date on which the emergency or major disaster commenced. Stipulates that the Governor of the affected State shall determine the date on which the emergency or major disaster commenced.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974.
